Water Color Sort is an addictive puzzle game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, your objective is to sort and match different colored water droplets to their corresponding color containers. The game starts with a jumbled mix of colors, and you must strategically move the droplets to the correct containers by dragging and dropping them. As you progress through the levels, the complexity increases, and you'll face more challenging color combinations.

The gameplay of Water Color Sort is both relaxing and mentally stimulating. It requires logical thinking and problem-solving skills to determine the most efficient way to sort the colors. The colorful visuals and soothing background music create a pleasant gaming experience.
